other_tests.findings: Elevated plasma concentrations of normetanephrine and metanephrine with a significant increase in metanephrine concentrations at several sampling sites.
Radioactivity noted in the region of the previous right adrenalectomy suggesting recurrent pheochromocytoma.
Increased [123I]MIBG uptake in the right adrenal bed, confirming results from vena caval sampling and 6-[18F]fluorodopamine PET.
